audio_sermons.title: (OM Orientation) Discipline - Part 1
audio_sermons.description: This is a practical look at Disciplining the thought life. He goes on to say that If you sow a thought, you reap an action. If you sow an action you reap a habit. If you sow a habit you reap a lifestyle. If you sow a lifestyle you reap an eternity. This is an excellent message for anyone who is worrisome, anxious and has an undisciplined thought life.

audio_sermons.title: (OM Orientation) Discipline - Part 2
audio_sermons.description: This is a practical look at Disciplining the thought life. He goes on to say that If you sow a thought, you reap an action. If you sow an action you reap a habit. If you sow a habit you reap a lifestyle. If you sow a lifestyle you reap an eternity. This is an excellent message for anyone who is worrisome, anxious and has an undisciplined thought life.

audio_sermons.title: Jesus the conquering Messiah II
audio_sermons.description: Dr. Manley, preaches a powerful message based on the prophecy of Jesus being sold for 30 pieces of silver. He gives some background information on the prophet Zachariah and how the people insulted him by paying him this low price. Dr. Manley then uses this background to launch into a powerful and humorous message with the question, â€œHow valuable is Jesus to YOU.â€ Included is the subtopic, â€œHow valuable are you to Jesus.â€
